review_data.title: Frisch und lecker
review_data.content: Frische Salate die Produkte von guter Qualität. Die Pizza war auf Wunsch belegbar. Sehr viel Auswahl bei den Getränken.

review_data.title: Friendly thoughtful service.
review_data.content: We had the pleasure of visiting Delish several times in our visit to Zurich. The quality of the food (particularly the coffee) was excellent. The room was comfortable and clean, a pleasant place to be. We also took advantage of their outdoor seating; a great...More

review_data.title: Delicious Croussant
review_data.content: This cafe is situated in the old town of Zurich and offers tasty and healthy food. You can choose from a continental breakfast to eggs most styles. There is also Chia pudding and a small selection of cheeses. Unfortunately, it is very expensive.

review_data.title: easy and tasty lunch
review_data.content: the place is very nice, good for a quiet break and for an easy, not overpriced lunch. i had two quiches, really delicious and tasty, but i wish there was a wider choice of cooked vegetables as sides.

review_data.title: Nice place
